body_html:
@vrv Thanks for your nice notes :)

I understand that you mean the semantic of specified channels is "the operation expect (for eg) 3 channels input", rather than "the operation will produce 3 channels output".

I think it is ok but my problem is I do not find any TensorFlow api to convert decoded images with different channels to (for eg) RGB format. I have to depend on external lib like opencv or pillow to deal with all kind of images, or I have to guarantee that all input images are of the same format.
